content: The Republicans have dug their own grave, but they won’t be lying in it for a few more years. They will almost certainly retain control of the Senate after the 2018 midterms — only eight Republican Senators are up for re-election next year, and six of those are from deep red states. But 2020 will be a different story. And when the Democrats regain control, there’s now absolutely no reason why they should allow any Republican to have any voice at all.
